II);;[- - -] ; in the squadron (turma) [- - -]; Iulius [- - -];;Similarly, [from - - -]:; in the squadron of Saturninus; Aurelius Isidorianus; in the squadron of Maximus; Aurelius Serenus;Similarly, archers from the unit of the Emesenians (numerus Emesenorum):; Aelius Marinus, centurion ordinatus; Sempronius Demetrius, sesquiplicarius; in the squadron of Rufus; Suaemus son of Taenus;Similarly, from the unit of the Orientals (numerus Orientalium):; in the squadron of Rufus; Iulius Valens
